Mobile



The projects are related to Android applications. My major skills include Java, Android programming, Android Wearable programming.

1. Coding Starter, coding education app


Description

This project has been motivated to provide free coding education contents. To acheive the goal, the user interface was designed to be easy to study on the mobile environment with one finger such as tapping blocks.

The accumulative download has been reached 3000+ and the average rating scores 3.9. To see details, please refer to the paper in 'Related Articles' below.

MongoDB
Heroku

2. Bisecu, smart bike lock app


Description

This project has been motivated to develop a smart bike lock application for Android. To acheive the goal, Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) has been used to receive signal from IoT device, smart bike lock. The applcation is able to not only control IoT devices but also keep track of activity tracking.

The application was introduced in MWC 2017 and presented in big media, including NBC News, AP news and Reuter. To see details, please refer to the paper in 'Related Articles' below.


Skills

Java
Android
Google Material Design


Period

5 months

  • 31 Jul
    2016

  • 1 Mar
    2017

Related Articles

  • [Video] NBC News (2017 MWC)
  • [Video] AP News (2017 MWC)
  • [Video] Reuter (2017 MWC)



3. Automatic Table Tennis Scoring App


Description

This project has been motivated to develop an automatic table tennis application for Android phone and Android wearable devices. To acheive the goal, Android phone processed sensor data from Android wearable and FFT algorithm to extract ball sound.

The architecture of automatic table tennis system has been applied for the patent.



Skills

Java
FFT
Android
Android Wearable
Google Material Design


Period

5 months

  • 1 Mar
    2017

  • 1 June
    2018

Related Articles

  • [Patent] Korea Patent 10-2019-0033604, Nov 11, 2020
